title: Monitor PG
content:
The steps to add a occupant in a PG are given below

1.Navigate to Occupant > Manage Occupant
2.Click on Add Occupant
3.Fill all the personal details of the occupant and click on Next.
4.Select PG > Select Floor > Select Room > Select Bed.
5. Now click on Finish to add Occupant
notes: Dashboard shows useful data based on usage
